Great Game! 
Pros
1. Gameplay
2. Skins are cool to have :)
3. Fun competitive play

Cons - 
1. Always a possibility of running into a hacker
2. People always claiming you're hacking even though you're just better xD
Awesome game, FPS and Coop paly amazing

Amazing game at it's core a lot of the previous "operations" had better maps then what I've seen in the last 2 years. Like Bazar was awesome and 3-5 months it was gone for public games, I've seen this game go downhill since mid 2017 but I do like the new ideas they are trying it's just personally not going to keep me interested in playing much. The worse part is most of the community, 5 years ago it was great but I haven't had a fun game regardless of the win or loss in months because of the player base, which most of them have played 4 years or less.
This game is a classic and still years later continues to be a fun to play game.
Very good game, lots of hacker in casual though, 10/10 would recommend to a friend
